home.title: YKD GLOBAL - Start Your Journey to World-Class Universities
home.testimonial_quote: Start Your Journey to World-Class Universities
home.about_description: Founded in 2005 by a group of financial, tax, and education industry elites with years of experience. We specialize in providing one-stop professional and personalized services, serving over 500 high-net-worth clients with excellent service over the past decade. Our expertise includes asset management, identity planning, and educational planning, with first-hand project resources in Hong Kong, Singapore, Europe, and Southeast Asia.
home.feature1_desc: YKD GLOBAL Secures Offers from World-Class Universities in 2024
home.feature3_desc: YKD GLOBAL Wishes You Success in Your Dream School

study_abroad.title: Study in Hong Kong - YKD GLOBAL
study_abroad.advantages_title: Advantages of Studying in Hong Kong
study_abroad.advantages_description: Level of Development: Hong Kong ranks 7th in Global City Comprehensive Competitiveness Ranking. Study Abroad Reputation: Hong Kong ranks 22nd in Best Student Cities Ranking. Safety Level: Hong Kong ranks 20th in Safest Cities Ranking (1st among Chinese cities) - Safe food, fresh air, clean water.
study_abroad.description: Based on students' individual situations and needs, we provide language exam training, optimal matching of universities and majors, elite school interview skills coaching, document optimization according to application school characteristics, timely submission and follow-up of applications, professional document writing guidance services, and help students complete information feedback work to achieve admission to elite schools with lower barriers.

rankings.title: HK University Rankings - YKD GLOBAL
rankings.qs_description: QS World University Rankings is a world-recognized authoritative ranking produced and published by QS UK, covering comprehensive world universities and subject rankings.
rankings.hk_changes_description: Hong Kong universities showed outstanding performance in this year's rankings. Among the 7 listed institutions, as high as 86% of universities showed significant improvements, demonstrating an overall enhancement in regional higher education strength. This upward trend fully reflects the continuous improvement of Hong Kong universities in educational quality and international competitiveness.
rankings.hku_description: Established in 1911, this is a public research university located in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region of China, excelling in fields such as medicine, business, humanities, and law. The University of Hong Kong ranks 1st among Hong Kong universities. Key majors: Business Administration, Finance, Linguistics, Law, Journalism, Education, Medicine, etc. Domestic comparison: Peking University QS 17, Hong Kong Top 8, Asia Third.
rankings.cuhk_title: The Chinese University of Hong Kong (CUHK)
rankings.cuhk_description: Established in 1984, located at Tat Chee Avenue in Kowloon Tong, with faculties including Business, Humanities and Social Science, Science and Engineering, Creative Media, and Law; the school motto is 'Through Learning and to Serve'. Hong Kong University Rankings: The Chinese University of Hong Kong ranks 2nd. Key majors: Finance, Accounting, Law, Business, Psychology, Electronics, Computer Science, etc. Domestic comparison: Renmin University of China, Fudan University QS 36, Hong Kong Top 8, Asia Sixth.
rankings.hkust_title: Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST)
rankings.hkust_description: Established in 1986, located in Clear Water Bay, Kowloon, it is one of the 8 government-funded higher education institutions in Hong Kong. HKUST offers interdisciplinary courses in science, engineering, business management, humanities, and social sciences, with Electronic Engineering, Civil Engineering, Computer Science, and Statistics as its key disciplines. Hong Kong University Rankings: Hong Kong University of Science and Technology ranks 3rd. Key majors: Civil, Mechanical, Chemical, Electronic, Economics, etc. Domestic comparison: Tsinghua University QS 47, Hong Kong Top 8, Asia Eleventh.

about.title: About Us - YKD GLOBAL
about.heading: About YKD GLOBAL
about.company_intro: YKD GLOBAL is committed to providing efficient and secure international identity planning and cross-border living solutions. The company focuses on core areas such as overseas education, global asset allocation, business expansion, and diversified identity acquisition, offering customers rich and personalized choices. With a professional global team and strict risk control, YKD GLOBAL continuously optimizes service experience to help clients achieve a seamless vision of international life.
about.education_planning: Our education expert team has extensive experience and expertise, customizing education planning solutions based on individual interests, talents, goals, and budgets. We provide comprehensive consultation and guidance on school and major selection, entrance exam preparation, extracurricular activities, and social practice planning. We help students enter their dream schools smoothly and lay a solid foundation for their future development. Our success rate for admission to top 100 global universities exceeds 90%, far higher than the international average of less than 20%. This includes prestigious institutions like the UK G5, Hong Kong's top three, and Australia's Group of Eight. The secret lies in customized planning, precise deployment, and comprehensive preparation.
about.identity_planning: In collaboration with domestic and international project partners, we provide comprehensive consultation on second-country residency permits and investment immigration, helping clients achieve success in finance, lifestyle, and the next generation's education and career development through identity planning. We understand that many "Elite Talent" applicants currently live and work primarily in mainland China. To meet the renewal needs of these clients, we match them with flexible Hong Kong employment opportunities and address issues such as property purchase in Hong Kong, company establishment, and children's education.
about.asset_planning: Our financial services team has years of investment experience and expertise, helping clients develop offshore asset allocation strategies that suit their needs and goals. Based on factors such as clients' risk tolerance, investment objectives, and time horizons, we customize investment plans and provide ongoing investment management and supervision.
about.template_credit: Website Template design by Free Website Templates

immigration.title: Service Process - YKD GLOBAL
immigration.sidebar_description: YKD GLOBAL specializes in solving core study abroad challenges, targeting pain points such as insufficient language scores and complex application processes to select the most suitable services for you.
immigration.team_description: YKD GLOBAL's professional consulting team deeply understands the admission criteria of top global institutions, helping students achieve seamless transition from college entrance exams to overseas elite universities. Through precise background enhancement planning and highly personalized document guidance, they effectively compensate for language score deficiencies, ensuring students don't miss quality educational resources or delay their academic opportunities due to language shortcomings.
immigration.application_service_description: We will help students enhance their application backgrounds to obtain qualification for applying to Hong Kong elite universities. Background enhancement includes but is not limited to exchange experiences at prestigious universities, internships at renowned companies, international business competitions, volunteer activities, leadership activities, professor recommendation letters, alumni recommendation letters, academic paper publications, and social practice projects and activities.
immigration.hk_application_title: Hong Kong Elite University Application Service
immigration.hk_application_description: We will assist students in organizing their application materials and professionally submit these materials to target institutions. Material preparation includes but is not limited to personal statements, transcripts, recommendation letters, proof of awards inside and outside school, social practice certificates, published paper materials, and international competition awards. Based on student capabilities, we help students select and apply to 4-6 Hong Kong institutions through career assessments, ensuring interview qualifications.
immigration.interview_coaching_description: We provide students with 4-day, 3-night full English Hong Kong admission interview coaching, including personal material mining, self-introduction preparation, professor mock interviews, authentic interview practice, interview material preparation, English presentations, English speaking, and professional material preparation. We also provide each student with 12 hours of 1-on-1 interview coaching and organize school visits in Hong Kong with admissions officers.
immigration.preparation_service_description: We provide incoming high school graduates with a 6-day, 5-night domestic freshman orientation camp during summer vacation. The camp mainly helps students understand university life, cultivate the right learning attitude, learn how to handle relationships with teachers, roommates, classmates, and seniors, and establish a self-management system. This thoroughly and effectively prepares students for university life.
immigration.integration_service_description: We provide students with a 7-day, 6-night Hong Kong student life integration experience during summer vacation, including Hong Kong university learning experiences, internships at Fortune 500 companies in Hong Kong, Hong Kong lifestyle experiences, international perspectives, and global financial center experiences. During their first two years of university, we will also provide students with Cantonese learning support, IELTS exam support, and local circle integration service support.
